l:dependency.name: Box UK - JSLint
l:dependency.l:description: Lint JavaScript files using a sensible ruleset - outputs to checkstyle format

l:dependency.name: Guava: Google Core Libraries for Java
l:dependency.l:description:
Guava is a suite of core and expanded libraries that include utility classes, google's collections, io classes, and much much more.
Guava has only one code dependency - javax.annotation, per the JSR-305 spec.

l:dependency.name: Rhino
l:dependency.l:description: Rhino is an open-source implementation of JavaScript written entirely in Java. It is typically embedded into Java applications to provide scripting to end users.
